title: UCP Profile Validator
description:
Enter a domain to validate its UCP (Universal Commerce Protocol) business profile. The validator fetches the profile from /.well-known/ucp and checks compliance with the official UCP specification.

Quick start: Just enter a domain and click Run. For help generating a valid profile, visit ucptools.dev.

domain.title: Domain
domain.description: Enter the merchant domain to validate (without https://). We'll fetch and validate the profile at https://{domain}/.well-known/ucp

mode.title: Validation Mode
mode.description:
Choose validation depth:
• Full - Complete validation including network checks (recommended)
• Quick - Structural validation only, faster but less thorough

includeRecommendations.title: Include Fix Recommendations
includeRecommendations.description: When enabled, the output includes actionable recommendations for fixing each issue found. Useful for developers implementing UCP for the first time.
